name: Avoid unnecessary final modifiers inside final Classes (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all the Methods containing unnecessary final modifiers.
output:
This report lists all  Methods of final Classes containing unnecessary final modifiers.

This QR provides the following information:
Method full name.
rationale: Final modifiers prevent child classes from overriding a method by prefixing the definition with final. If the class itself is being defined final then it cannot be extended and the modifier is useless.
remediation: Review the source code in order to reduce the number Methods of final classes containing unnecessary final modifiers.
sample:
<?php

final class CastTest
 {
     public final function test() // Violation - Unnecessary final modifiers inside a final class
     {
     }
 }

?>
